mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL -2 WEEK) + INTERVAL 1 DAY AS ALL_DATE UNION ALL SELECT ALL_DATE + INTERVAL 1 DAY FROM CTE WHERE ALL_DATE < NOW() ) SELECT CTE.ALL_DATE AS `date` , IFNULL(B.COUNT, 0) as `count` FROM CTE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TU.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS NEW_USER_DATE , COUNT(TU.REG_DATE) AS COUNT FROM TB_USER TU WHERE TU.REG_DATE BETWEEN DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL -2 WEEK) AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(TU.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') ) B ON CTE.ALL_DATE = B.NEW_USER_DATE
